job_tasks.phrase: ensure the scalability, reliability, availability and security of our internal systems and enterprise revenue platforms within Business Technology to build, commission and deploy the technology and data infrastructure and architecture to meet business revenue growth objectives.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase clearly indicates the need to align technical infrastructure and architecture with the company's business objectives, specifically 'business revenue growth objectives'.

job_tasks.phrase: By defining a path to implementation, this role should ensure that product decisions and planning are carried out in a scalable manner.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the responsibility of translating business/product decisions into a scalable technical plan.

job_tasks.phrase: establish a collaborative path with our revenue teams: Sales, Marketing, Customer Success and Support.
job_tasks.justification: This shows the requirement to work with and understand the needs of various business revenue-generating departments.

job_tasks.phrase: Facilitate the overall architecture of our business systems across teams, system owners and engineers.
job_tasks.justification: This involves designing and guiding the structure of systems, which is a core software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide guidance on the architecture and its components through the commissioning and decommissioning of all services involved.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates responsibility for the lifecycle of services, including their architecture, which is part of software development and operations.

job_tasks.phrase: Ownership of revenue data management: Data architecture, governance, data protection, etc.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions data management responsibilities including architecture and governance, which fall under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide hands-on technical leadership on projects with a size and scope of +5 teams
job_tasks.justification: This signifies direct involvement in technical projects and leadership, a key aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Helping teams plan and estimate activities
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding project scope and timelines to aid in business planning and forecasting.

job_tasks.phrase: Supporting and challenging a realistic roadmap with team leads and product managers, challenging timelines and providing predictability of deliverables to the business.
job_tasks.justification: This task is focused on ensuring technical roadmaps align with business expectations and providing business predictability.

job_tasks.phrase: challenging timelines and providing predictability of deliverables to the business.
Mentor, develop and coach other senior software engineers, engineering managers and business leaders.

open communication, regular feedback: as a language-focused company, we value the importance of clear, honest communication. We value smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback, and believe that leading with empathy makes us better together.

Annual learning budget: because we never stop learning, we've set up an annual budget for your professional development-pick a learning path which contributes to your career development and we'll back you up.

Monthly full-day hacking sessions: every month, we have Hack Fridays, where you can spend your time diving into a project you're passionate about and get the opportunity to work with other teams-we value your initiatives, impact, and creativity.

soft_skills.phrase: Mentor, develop and coach other senior software engineers, engineering managers and business leaders.

open communication, regular feedback: as a language-focused company, we value the importance of clear, honest communication. We value smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback, and believe that leading with empathy makes us better together.
establish a collaborative path with our revenue teams: Sales, Marketing, Customer Success and Support.
challenging timelines and providing predictability of deliverables to the business.

Annual learning budget: because we never stop learning, we've set up an annual budget for your professional development-pick a learning path which contributes to your career development and we'll back you up.

Monthly full-day hacking sessions: every month, we have Hack Fridays, where you can spend your time diving into a project you're passionate about and get the opportunity to work with other teams-we value your initiatives, impact, and creativity.
Ownership of revenue data management: Data architecture, governance, data protection, etc.

classification.rationale: This job description focuses heavily on business alignment, system architecture, data management, and mentoring senior engineers. It lacks any mention of specific AI technologies, modeling techniques, or generative AI frameworks, which are central to the ML Engineer and GenAI Engineer profiles. Therefore, it does not fit the technical criteria for either AI-focused role.
